special_text:
Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
[level 1] Create three 1/1 colorless Food Golem artifact creature tokens with haste and “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: You gain 3 life.”
notes:
New card — Replaced Essence of Aether

Wanted the uncommon colorless token producer to feel a bit more explosive. Also a call to Cadewyn’s effect.
